directions.step:
Date: Sun, 25 Feb 1996 22:41:09 -0500
From: "Vernon E. Phipps Jr." <cook4u@vivanet.com>
Melt margarine and marshmallows in large pot over low heat. Stir until melted. Remove from heat. Add Rice Krispie cereal; stir until all cereal is coated. Press the treat intoa greased 13 x 9 x 2 inch pan. Cool, cut into squares or any shape you like.
